Creating a separate secure partition on the devices would be the best method to prevent the potential leakage of sensitive corporate data from personal mobile devices accessing corporate applications.

This method is a part of what's known as Mobile Device Management (MDM), and it essentially separates or partitions the personal data and applications from the corporate ones on a user's device. This measure not only ensures that corporate data and applications are secured in their own environment, but also enables more direct control over the data within this specific partition.
